# Cricket Booking Software - Project Instructions

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Mantine UI (Component Library)
- Supabase (Backend & Database)
- Mobile-first responsive design

## Project Structure
- `app/(public)` - Public-facing pages (home, bookings, etc.)
- `app/(admin)` - Admin panel pages
- `components` - Reusable UI components
- `lib` - Utilities, helpers, and Supabase client
- `styles` - Global styles and theme configuration
- `types` - TypeScript type definitions

## Development Guidelines
- Use Mantine UI components for all UI elements
- Follow mobile-first responsive design principles
- Keep environment variables in .env.local
- Use Supabase for authentication and database operations
- Separate public and admin routes using route groups
